paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant c.2808_2811delACAA (p.Ala938Profs) including penetrance data from affected family members.

patients.phenotype: male breast cancer in the proband; breast cancer in both daughters

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 75-year-old patient was admitted to the Genetic Outpatient Clinic with a diagnosis of right breast cancer...

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with breast cancer, ductal invasive carcinoma
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One daughter was diagnosed aged 41 in 2010.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with left breast cancer, lobular invasive carcinoma
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The second daughter was diagnosed aged 38 years in 2014.

functional_data.summary: The detected mutation causes a frameshift mutation, resulting in the creation of an additional translation termination codon and the synthesis of an abnormal protein.

variants.segregation_data: The same BRCA2 gene mutation was reported in one of the patient’s daughters.
variants.population_frequency: The c.2808_2811delACAA mutation is the second most reported frameshift BRCA2 mutation.
variants.additional_notes: This mutation is associated with a later age of disease, a higher histological degree, and a higher mitotic index.
key_quotes: The presence of the c.2808_2811delACAA (p.Ala938Profs) mutation in the BRCA2 gene was associated with a diagnosis at a later age, a higher histological degree, a higher mitotic index (Ki-67), a positive steroid receptor status, the luminal B subtype and HER2- breast cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
